QuestData.Title: A Little Diversion
QuestData.Description: I was sent here to scout out the centaur activity. I've been trackin' their every movement for days! It's time for me ta sneak out, but they've got this oasis surrounded.$B$BYou look like a dangerous one. Can you make a lot of noise for me? Stir 'em up! Start killin' indiscriminately. While they're looking out for you I'll slip out to get my info to Regthar Deathgate.
QuestData.CompletionText: I love watchin' these guys scurry all over.
QuestData.RewardText: Oh, ho! That was beautiful. I probably shouldn't have stayed to watch. Now that they're looking for you, I'll slip quietly away in the dust of their aimless gallopin'.$B$BBe sure to look for my buds at the other pools. Boss has agents at every one.
